thread.title: Amy Schumer Hosts 'Saturday Night Live', Takes Aim At Gun Culture And The Kardashians
thread.title_full: Amy Schumer Hosts 'Saturday Night Live', Takes Aim At Gun Culture And The Kardashians

author: Ryan Barrell
title: Amy Schumer Hosts 'Saturday Night Live', Takes Aim At Gun Culture And The Kardashians
text:
Amy Schumer Hosts 'Saturday Night Live', Takes Aim At Gun Culture And The Kardashians The Huffington Post UK | By Ryan Barrell reddit 
Comedian Amy Schumer had audiences across the US laughing their heads off on Saturday when she hosted 'Saturday Night Live' for the very first time. 
In her opening monologue, Amy took on female rolemodels, her new film, US gun culture and the Kardashians. 
Here's her full eight-minute monologue: 
"We have to be a role model for little girls, because who do they have? All they have, literally, is the Kardashians," she said. "Is that a great message for little girls, a whole family of women who take the faces they were born with as a light suggestion?" 
The 'Trainwreck' star later starred in a mock PSA video about guns, taking aim at the US's relationship with weapons. SEE ALSO:
